text: India's consistent engagement has always been aimed at fostering stability and prosperity in Nepal.
India is a responsible neighbor that offers constructive support to its partners.
India's consistent posture has been to support the aspirations of the Nepali people.
India's perspective on such matters carries significant weight due to historical ties.
This is a confident and assertive statement reflecting India's growing stature on the world stage.
India's clear position is crucial for the long-term health of India-Nepal bilateral ties.
India must assert its traditional role as the guardian of stability in the Himalayan region.
The statement reinforces India's position as the indispensable partner for Nepal's progress.
This is a necessary assertion of India's regional responsibilities and strategic imperatives.
The statement is a firm reminder that India will not tolerate threats to its security from its neighbors.
India's security is intrinsically linked to Nepal's stability and political direction.
India's strategic vision for South Asia includes a stable and friendly Nepal.
